commentBody: I must be in the minority when watching sports on TV.  I wish there was a way to get rid of the graphics.  All I want to see on the screen is the score and the time remaining.  The arrows, circles, x's and o's by the "expert" analyst add nothing to the game.  Maybe one day while the game is shown on the traditional over the air network, the NFL Network would show the feed without sound and graphics.
